verses.verse: וַיִּשְׁכַּ֤ב <WH7901> slept יְהֽוֹשָׁפָט֙ <WH3092> Now Jehoshaphat עִם־ <WH5973> with אֲבֹתָ֔יו <WH1> with his fathers וַיִּקָּבֵ֥ר <WH6912> and was buried עִם־ <WH5973> with אֲבֹתָ֖יו <WH1> with his fathers בְּעִ֣יר <WH5892> in the city דָּוִ֑יד <WH1732> of David וַיִּמְלֹ֛ךְ <WH4427> reigned יְהוֹרָ֥ם <WH3088> And Jehoram בְּנ֖וֹ <WH1121> his son תַּחְתָּֽיו׃ <WH8478> his place

וְלֽוֹ־ אַחִ֞ים <WH251> And he had brethren בְּנֵ֣י <WH1121> the sons יְהוֹשָׁפָ֗ט <WH3092> of Jehoshaphat עֲזַרְיָ֤ה <WH5838> Azariah וִֽיחִיאֵל֙ <WH3171> and Jehiel וּזְכַרְיָ֣הוּ <WH2148> and Zechariah וַעֲזַרְיָ֔הוּ <WH5838> and Azariah וּמִיכָאֵ֖ל <WH4317> and Michael וּשְׁפַטְיָ֑הוּ <WH8203> and Shephatiah כָּל־ <WH3605> All אֵ֕לֶּה <WH428> these בְּנֵ֥י <WH1121> all these [were] the sons יְהוֹשָׁפָ֖ט <WH3092> of Jehoshaphat מֶ֥לֶךְ־ <WH4428> king יִשְׂרָאֵֽל׃ <WH3478> of Israel

וַיִּתֵּ֣ן <WH5414> gave לָהֶ֣ם ׀ <WH1992> like אֲ֠בִיהֶם <WH1> And their father מַתָּנ֨וֹת <WH4979> gifts רַבּ֜וֹת <WH7227> them great לְכֶ֤סֶף <WH3701> of silver וּלְזָהָב֙ <WH2091> and of gold וּלְמִגְדָּנ֔וֹת <WH4030> and of precious things עִם־ <WH5973> with עָרֵ֥י <WH5892> cities מְצֻר֖וֹת <WH4694> with fenced בִּֽיהוּדָ֑ה <WH3063> in Judah וְאֶת־ <WH853> הַמַּמְלָכָ֛ה <WH4467> but the kingdom נָתַ֥ן <WH5414> gave לִֽיהוֹרָ֖ם <WH3088> he to Jehoram כִּי־ <WH3588> because ה֥וּא <WH1931> he הַבְּכֽוֹר׃ <WH1060> because he [was] the firstborn פ

וַיָּ֨קָם <WH6965> was risen up יְהוֹרָ֜ם <WH3088> Now when Jehoram עַל־ <WH5921> over מַמְלֶ֤כַת <WH4467> to the kingdom אָבִיו֙ <WH1> of his father וַיִּתְחַזַּ֔ק <WH2388> he strengthened וַיַּהֲרֹ֥ג <WH2026> himself and slew אֶת־ <WH853> כָּל־ <WH3605> all אֶחָ֖יו <WH251> all his brethren בֶּחָ֑רֶב <WH2719> with the sword וְגַ֖ם <WH1571> also מִשָּׂרֵ֥י <WH8269> and [divers] also of the princes יִשְׂרָאֵֽל׃ <WH3478> of Israel

בֶּן־ <WH1121> old שְׁלֹשִׁ֥ים <WH7970> [was] thirty וּשְׁתַּ֛יִם <WH8147> and two שָׁנָ֖ה <WH8141> years יְהוֹרָ֣ם <WH3088> Jehoram בְּמָלְכ֑וֹ <WH4427> when he began to reign וּשְׁמוֹנֶ֣ה <WH8083> eight שָׁנִ֔ים <WH8141> years מָלַ֖ךְ <WH4427> and he reigned בִּירוּשָׁלִָֽם׃ <WH3389> in Jerusalem

וַיֵּ֜לֶךְ <WH1980> walked בְּדֶ֣רֶךְ ׀ <WH1870> in the way מַלְכֵ֣י <WH4428> of the kings יִשְׂרָאֵ֗ל <WH3478> of Israel כַּאֲשֶׁ֤ר <WH834> after עָשׂוּ֙ <WH6213> like as did בֵּ֣ית <WH1004> the house אַחְאָ֔ב <WH256> of Ahab כִּ֚י <WH3588> for בַּת־ <WH1323> for he had the daughter אַחְאָ֔ב <WH256> of Ahab הָ֥יְתָה <WH1961> become לּ֖וֹ אִשָּׁ֑ה <WH802> to wife וַיַּ֥עַשׂ <WH6213> and he wrought הָרַ֖ע <WH7451> [that which was] evil בְּעֵינֵ֥י <WH5869> in the eyes יְהוָֽה׃ <WH3068> of the LORD

וְלֹא־ <WH3808> was not אָבָ֣ה <WH14> would יְהוָ֗ה <WH3068> Howbeit the LORD לְהַשְׁחִית֙ <WH7843> not destroy אֶת־ <WH853> בֵּ֣ית <WH1004> the house דָּוִ֔יד <WH1732> of David לְמַ֣עַן <WH4616> because הַבְּרִ֔ית <WH1285> because of the covenant אֲשֶׁ֥ר <WH834> which כָּרַ֖ת <WH3772> that he had made לְדָוִ֑יד <WH1732> with David וְכַאֲשֶׁ֣ר <WH834> which אָמַ֗ר <WH559> and as he promised לָתֵ֨ת <WH5414> to give ל֥וֹ נִ֛יר <WH5216> a light וּלְבָנָ֖יו <WH1121> to him and to his sons כָּל־ <WH3605> for הַיָּמִֽים׃ <WH3117> for ever

בְּיָמָיו֙ <WH3117> In his days פָּשַׁ֣ע <WH6586> revolted אֱד֔וֹם <WH123> the Edomites מִתַּ֖חַת <WH8478> Thahash יַד־ <WH3027> from under the dominion יְהוּדָ֑ה <WH3063> of Judah וַיַּמְלִ֥יכוּ <WH4427> and made עֲלֵיהֶ֖ם <WH5921> over מֶֽלֶךְ׃ <WH4428> themselves a king

וַיַּֽעֲבֹ֤ר <WH5674> went forth יְהוֹרָם֙ <WH3088> Then Jehoram עִם־ <WH5973> with שָׂרָ֔יו <WH8269> with his princes וְכָל־ <WH3605> and all הָרֶ֖כֶב <WH7393> and all his chariots עִמּ֑וֹ <WH5973> with וַיְהִי֙ <WH1961> become קָ֣ם <WH6965> with him and he rose up לַ֔יְלָה <WH3915> by night וַיַּ֗ךְ <WH5221> and smote אֶת־ <WH853> אֱדוֹם֙ <WH123> the Edomites הַסּוֹבֵ֣ב <WH5437> which compassed him in אֵלָ֔יו <WH413> about וְאֵ֖ת <WH853> שָׂרֵ֥י <WH8269> and the captains הָרָֽכֶב׃ <WH7393> of the chariots

וַיִּפְשַׁ֨ע <WH6586> revolted אֱד֜וֹם <WH123> So the Edomites מִתַּ֣חַת <WH8478> Thahash יַד־ <WH3027> from under the hand יְהוּדָ֗ה <WH3063> of Judah עַ֚ד <WH5704> against הַיּ֣וֹם <WH3117> unto this day הַזֶּ֔ה <WH2088> to this אָ֣ז <WH227> Then תִּפְשַׁ֥ע <WH6586> revolt לִבְנָ֛ה <WH3841> [also] did Libnah בָּעֵ֥ת <WH6256> The same time הַהִ֖יא <WH1931> the same מִתַּ֣חַת <WH8478> Thahash יָד֑וֹ <WH3027> from under his hand כִּ֣י <WH3588> because עָזַ֔ב <WH5800> because he had forsaken אֶת־ <WH853> יְהוָ֖ה <WH3068> the LORD אֱלֹהֵ֥י <WH430> God אֲבֹתָֽיו׃ <WH1> of his fathers

גַּם־ <WH1571> Moreover ה֥וּא <WH1931> he עָשָֽׂה־ <WH6213> Moreover he made בָמ֖וֹת <WH1116> high places בְּהָרֵ֣י <WH2022> in the mountains יְהוּדָ֑ה <WH3063> of Judah וַיֶּ֙זֶן֙ <WH2181> to commit fornication אֶת־ <WH853> יֹשְׁבֵ֣י <WH3427> and caused the inhabitants יְרוּשָׁלִַ֔ם <WH3389> of Jerusalem וַיַּדַּ֖ח <WH5080> and compelled אֶת־ <WH853> יְהוּדָֽה׃ <WH3063> Judah פ

וַיָּבֹ֤א <WH935> And there came אֵלָיו֙ <WH413> then מִכְתָּ֔ב <WH4385> a writing מֵֽאֵלִיָּ֥הוּ <WH452> to him from Elijah הַנָּבִ֖יא <WH5030> the prophet לֵאמֹ֑ר <WH559> saying כֹּ֣ה ׀ <WH3541> Thus אָמַ֣ר <WH559> Thus saith יְהוָ֗ה <WH3068> the LORD אֱלֹהֵי֙ <WH430> God דָּוִ֣יד <WH1732> of David אָבִ֔יךָ <WH1> thy father תַּ֗חַת <WH8478> Thahash אֲשֶׁ֤ר <WH834> after לֹֽא־ <WH3808> have not הָלַ֙כְתָּ֙ <WH1980> Because thou hast not walked בְּדַרְכֵי֙ <WH1870> in the ways יְהוֹשָׁפָ֣ט <WH3092> of Jehoshaphat אָבִ֔יךָ <WH1> thy father וּבְדַרְכֵ֖י <WH1870> nor in the ways אָסָ֥א <WH609> of Asa מֶֽלֶךְ־ <WH4428> king יְהוּדָֽה׃ <WH3063> of Judah

וַתֵּ֗לֶךְ <WH1980> have walked בְּדֶ֙רֶךְ֙ <WH1870> in the way מַלְכֵ֣י <WH4428> of the kings יִשְׂרָאֵ֔ל <WH3478> of Israel וַתַּזְנֶ֤ה <WH2181> to go a whoring אֶת־ <WH853> יְהוּדָה֙ <WH3063> and hast made Judah וְאֶת־ <WH853> יֹשְׁבֵ֣י <WH3427> and the inhabitants יְרוּשָׁלִַ֔ם <WH3389> of Jerusalem כְּהַזְנ֖וֹת <WH2181> like to the whoredoms בֵּ֣ית <WH1004> of the house אַחְאָ֑ב <WH256> of Ahab וְגַ֨ם <WH1571> have also אֶת־ <WH853> אַחֶ֧יךָ <WH251> thy brethren בֵית־ <WH1004> house אָבִ֛יךָ <WH1> of thy father's הַטּוֹבִ֥ים <WH2896> [which were] better מִמְּךָ֖ <WH4480> than הָרָֽגְתָּ׃ <WH2026> and also hast slain

הִנֵּ֣ה <WH2009> behold יְהוָ֗ה <WH3068> will the LORD נֹגֵ֛ף <WH5062> smite מַגֵּפָ֥ה <WH4046> plague גְדוֹלָ֖ה <WH1419> Behold with a great בְּעַמֶּ֑ךָ <WH5971> thy people וּבְבָנֶ֥יךָ <WH1121> and thy children וּבְנָשֶׁ֖יךָ <WH802> and thy wives וּבְכָל־ <WH3605> and all רְכוּשֶֽׁךָ׃ <WH7399> and all thy goods

וְאַתָּ֛ה <WH859> you בָּחֳלָיִ֥ים <WH2483> sickness רַבִּ֖ים <WH7227> And thou [shalt have] great בְּמַחֲלֵ֣ה <WH4245> by disease מֵעֶ֑יךָ <WH4578> of thy bowels עַד־ <WH5704> until יֵצְא֤וּ <WH3318> fall out מֵעֶ֙יךָ֙ <WH4578> until thy bowels מִן־ <WH4480> because הַחֹ֔לִי <WH2483> by reason of the sickness יָמִ֖ים <WH3117> day עַל־ <WH5921> and יָמִֽים׃ <WH3117> by day

וַיָּ֨עַר <WH5782> stirred up יְהוָ֜ה <WH3068> Moreover the LORD עַל־ <WH5921> against יְהוֹרָ֗ם <WH3088> against Jehoram אֵ֣ת <WH853> ר֤וּחַ <WH7307> the spirit הַפְּלִשְׁתִּים֙ <WH6430> of the Philistines וְהָ֣עַרְבִ֔ים <WH6163> and of the Arabians אֲשֶׁ֖ר <WH834> who עַל־ <WH5921> against יַ֥ד <WH3027> able כּוּשִֽׁים׃ <WH3569> the Ethiopians

וַיַּעֲל֤וּ <WH5927> And they came up בִֽיהוּדָה֙ <WH3063> into Judah וַיִּבְקָע֔וּהָ <WH1234> and brake וַיִּשְׁבּ֗וּ <WH7617> into it and carried away אֵ֤ת <WH853> כָּל־ <WH3605> all הָרְכוּשׁ֙ <WH7399> all the substance הַנִּמְצָ֣א <WH4672> that was found לְבֵית־ <WH1004> house הַמֶּ֔לֶךְ <WH4428> in the king's וְגַם־ <WH1571> together בָּנָ֖יו <WH1121> and his sons וְנָשָׁ֑יו <WH802> also and his wives וְלֹ֤א <WH3808> no נִשְׁאַר־ <WH7604> left לוֹ֙ בֵּ֔ן <WH1121> so that there was never a son כִּ֥י <WH3588> for אִם־ <WH518> lo יְהוֹאָחָ֖ז <WH3059> him save Jehoahaz קְטֹ֥ן <WH6996> the youngest בָּנָֽיו׃ <WH1121> of his sons

וְאַחֲרֵ֖י <WH310> And after כָּל־ <WH3605> all זֹ֑את <WH2063> likewise נְגָפ֨וֹ <WH5062> smote יְהוָ֧ה ׀ <WH3068> all this the LORD בְּמֵעָ֛יו <WH4578> him in his bowels לָחֳלִ֖י <WH2483> disease לְאֵ֥ין <WH369> else מַרְפֵּֽא׃ <WH4832> cure

וַיְהִ֣י <WH1961> came לְיָמִ֣ים ׀ <WH3117> And it came to pass that in process of time מִיָּמִ֡ים <WH3117> years וּכְעֵת֩ <WH6256> after צֵ֨את <WH3318> fell out הַקֵּ֜ץ <WH7093> the end לְיָמִ֣ים <WH3117> years שְׁנַ֗יִם <WH8147> of two יָצְא֤וּ <WH3318> came מֵעָיו֙ <WH4578> his bowels עִם־ <WH5973> by reason חָלְי֔וֹ <WH2483> of his sickness וַיָּ֖מָת <WH4191> so he died בְּתַחֲלֻאִ֣ים <WH8463> diseases רָעִ֑ים <WH7451> of sore וְלֹא־ <WH3808> no עָ֨שׂוּ <WH6213> made ל֥וֹ עַמּ֛וֹ <WH5971> And his people שְׂרֵפָ֖ה <WH8316> no burning כִּשְׂרֵפַ֥ת <WH8316> for him like the burning אֲבֹתָֽיו׃ <WH1> of his fathers

בֶּן־ <WH1121> years old שְׁלֹשִׁ֤ים <WH7970> Thirty וּשְׁתַּ֙יִם֙ <WH8147> and two הָיָ֣ה <WH1961> become בְמָלְכ֔וֹ <WH4427> was he when he began to reign וּשְׁמוֹנֶ֣ה <WH8083> eight שָׁנִ֔ים <WH8141> years מָלַ֖ךְ <WH4427> and he reigned בִּירוּשָׁלִָ֑ם <WH3389> in Jerusalem וַיֵּ֙לֶךְ֙ <WH1980> departed בְּלֹ֣א <WH3808> no חֶמְדָּ֔ה <WH2532> without being desired וַֽיִּקְבְּרֻ֙הוּ֙ <WH6912> Howbeit they buried בְּעִ֣יר <WH5892> him in the city דָּוִ֔יד <WH1732> of David וְלֹ֖א <WH3808> no בְּקִבְר֥וֹת <WH6913> but not in the sepulchres הַמְּלָכִֽים׃ <WH4428> of the kings
